title: Du Halde Jesuits in China MCQ 4

content.prompt: All of the following statements about Du Halde are factually accurate. Which would most likely lead historians to question the objectivity of his portrayal of the scholars shown in the image?

choices.label: He was the confessor to an important French noble.
He based his observations of China on unpublished translations of Chinese texts.
He was a Jesuit and based his book on Jesuit missionary reports.

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain the significance of a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience, including how these might limit the use(s) of a source.
